item.title: Android TV sucks
item.author: Auteur
item.description: I have recently purchased a new TV, it is brand new, with a computer built-in and everything one could wish forâ€¦ and I am proud to say it : my Android TV sucks! What is an Android TV? Basically, it is a TV with Android installed inside of it. This is like having a small computer built inside your TV and running the Android OS. It allows you to run several well known applications directly on your TV thanks to your remote.
